sentences.en: But memories of her early straits had made her excessively thrifty.
sentences.cn: 然而,由于对昔日的艰苦岁月记忆犹新,她生活过分检朴.

sentences.en: Cynthia was brunette, her figure full, though not excessively.
sentences.cn: 辛西娅的皮肤和头发都是浅黑色的, 身材丰满, 但并不过分.

sentences.en: Do not whine or complain excessively.
sentences.cn: 不要发牢骚或过度抱怨。

sentences.en: Especially at corners and on slopes he was almost excessively careful.
sentences.cn: 在拐弯抹角和上下坡儿的时候,他特别的小心.几乎是过度的小心.

sentences.en: Hardy has often been criticised for an excessively pessimistic view of life.
sentences.cn: 哈代由于对生活持过度悲观的态度而常常受到批评。

sentences.en: Haulage distances are not excessively long.
He was my godfather, and excessively attached to me.
sentences.cn: 他是我的教父, 非常疼爱我.

sentences.en: His private demons drove him to drink excessively for many years.
sentences.cn: 他个人的心魔让他多年以来酗酒度日。

sentences.en: Howerer, under heavy load the shaft may deflect excessively.
sentences.cn: 但是, 在重载作用下,轴会发生过度挠曲.

sentences.en: It is never excessively cold in winter there.
sentences.cn: 那儿的冬天一向不太冷.

sentences.en: Motley makes his villains excessively villainous and his heroes wearisomely heroic.
sentences.cn: 莫特利把坏人写得过于无赖,把他的英雄写得过于英勇.

sentences.en: Mum had started taking pills and drinking excessively.
Sadly, the film is let down by an excessively simple plot.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，过于简单的情节使得这部电影令人失望。

sentences.en: The doctor advised him not to drink excessively.
sentences.cn: 医生劝他不要饮酒过度.

sentences.en: The Secretary of State for Environment has the power to cap councils which spend excessively.
sentences.cn: 环境大臣有权限定那些铺张浪费的委员会的支出。

sentences.en: What a sigh is there! The heart is excessively charged.
sentences.cn: 这是何等样的叹息! 心里必有过度的忧忿.

words.tran_cn: 超过，超额；过度，过量；无节制

trans.tran_en: greater than what seems reasonable or appropriate
